Title: Confusion Na Wa
Writer: Kenneth Gyang, Tom Rowlands-Rees (story), Tom Rowlands-Rees
Actors: Ramsey Nouah, Ali Nuhu, O.C. Ukeje
Plot: Set in a Nigerian city Confusion Na Wa is a dark comedy about a group of strangers whose fates become intertwined over the course of 24 hours. At the heart of everything is a phone found by...
